superseding_details.unit_reference: The consent allowed for a single storey extension which has not yet been constructed but will be as part of this new application
superseding_details.component_description: The property is to be converted into three flats where as permission was orginally granted for one dwelling.

superseding_details.unit_reference: Permission was granted for hip to gable roof extension with rooflights and dormer windows not all has been constructed yet so will be constructed following permission to convert to 3 dwellings
superseding_details.component_description: The dormer window already benefits from permission but forms part of this application for the third flat

decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): HP-LR-04; HP-LR-02; HP-LR-05; HP-LR-01; HP-LR_03
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| Cycle storage for ^IN;  bicycle spaces shall be provided within the curtilage of the development, within secure, lockable compounds in accordance with the designated locations identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2 and all adopted standards prior to the first occupation of the building. The storage spaces shall be permanently retained thereafter.

Reason:  To provide adequate bicycle storage in accordance with policy and T5 of the London Plan (2021). | Notwithstanding any information submitted, prior to the occupation of the development full details of hard and soft landscaping works and boundary treatments; and a landscaping management plan covering 5 years from the implementation of final planting shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

The approved works shall be carried out prior to the occupation of any part of the development or in accordance with the programme agreed by the Local Planning Authority.  Any trees or other plants, which die or are removed within the first five years following the implementation of the landscaping scheme shall be replaced during the next planting season.

Reason: To ensure that the development is landscaped in the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area, to ensure appropriately landscaped amenity space and public realm, in accordance with policies D3, D4 and D8 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | Prior to commencement of the development, details shall be submitted to the Council for approval in writing, of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling /wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings, namely, kitchen/dining/living/bath and shower rooms above/below bedrooms of separate dwellings and staircase adjoining bedrooms. The assessment and mitigation measures shall be based on standards of the Council's SPG10 and the criteria of BS8233:2014. Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason - To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site is not adversely affected by noise in accordance with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) and Ealing SPG10.
description: Construction of a rear extension and rear roof extension, installation of skylights on the front roof slope and rear extension, conversion of an existing house into 3 self-contained flats, extension of a vehicle crossing to allow access to three off-street carparks, and provision of associated cycle storage and refuse storage facilities.es.
